twoSetSkill.name: Stage Lights 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Robot assistant's Flash Bomb, Shockwave, and Laser attacks have a 30% chance of dealing DMG 2 times.

threeSetSkill.name: Solo Dance 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Removes the enemy number restrictions from all stigmata skills in this stigmata set. The host's attacks gain 15% Total DMG Multiplier.
